articles.description: Nottingham Forest are fifth in the Championship and stand a real chance of doing battle for promotion this season.
articles.content:
The 'majority of the bottom half' of the Premier League want relegation to be scrapped if the season resumes in June.
The bottom six clubs in the division have already made their unhappiness with the neutral venues plan clear and are strongly against the ide… [+2059 chars]

articles.author: Ian Doyle
articles.title: Liverpool and Everton given further Premier League return hint by radical La Liga plan - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool and Everton are waiting to discover if and when the Premier League will return this season
articles.content:
Liverpool and Everton have been given a further hint about how the Premier League campaign could look as more details emerge about plans for La Liga. 
The Spanish top flight has been suspended since March 12 due to the coronavirus outbreak, a day before elit… [+1817 chars]

articles.author: Sky Sports
articles.title: Coronavirus: Pro sport in England could resume on June 1 - Sky Sports
articles.description: Top-level sport in England could restart behind closed doors from June 1 but spectators may not be able to attend venues until a vaccine is found.
articles.content:
Top-level sport in England could restart behind closed doors from June 1 but spectators may not be able to attend venues until a coronavirus vaccine is found.
The government's road map for exiting the lockdown, imposed to limit the spread of coronavirus, was… [+9295 chars]

articles.author: Sam Meade
articles.title: Marcus Rashford discusses Man Utd moment he is most proud of - Mirror Online
articles.description: Marcus Rashford netted four times in his first two starts which came in the space of three days in a whirlwind start to his Man Utd career
articles.content:
Marcus Rashford admits nothing has been able to compare to his first goal for Manchester United. 
The striker received a late call-up to the first team for a Europa League tie against Midtjylland in 2016.
 Rashford seized his opportunity, scoring twice at O… [+1752 chars]

articles.author: Sky Sports
articles.title: EFL: Rotherham chairman expects League One and League Two to be cancelled - Sky Sports
articles.description: Rotherham chairman Tony Stewart says he would be "amazed" if the League One and League Two seasons are not cancelled.
articles.content:
Rotherham chairman Tony Stewart expects a decision to be made on the fate of the League One and League Two seasons by Thursday and would be "amazed" if they are not cancelled.
The English Football League is due to meet later this week and it has been widely … [+1790 chars]

articles.author: Richard Fay
articles.title: Jaap Stam tells Manchester United what to do with Paul Pogba - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester United treble winner Jaap Stam has spoken about Paul Pogba and his future at Old Trafford.
articles.content:
Jaap Stam has urged Manchester United to keep Paul Pogba at the club and build their next great team around him.
The French midfielder continues to be linked with an Old Trafford exit at the end of the season, a year on from admitting he was looking for a 'n… [+1518 chars]

articles.author: Sam Meade
articles.title: Atletico Madrid 'offer Thomas Partey to Liverpool in Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain swap deal' - Mirror Online
articles.description: Atletico Madrid and Liverpool could be involved in summer transfer action with the Spaniards keen to swap Thomas Partey for Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain
articles.content:
Atletico Madrid are eyeing a move for Liverpool's Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain and are prepared to offer Thomas Partey in exchange.
The Ghanaian was part of the Atletico side that won 3-2 at Anfield back in March.
